website_summaries.verdict: An extension pole that reaches up to 24 feet makes this the fruit picker that will never be beaten by even the tallest fruit trees.
pros: The large-volume fruit picker allows you to keep multiple fruits in the basket before bringing it down to unload
It makes the picking process less tedious
cons: Some had trouble with the connector piece between the two sides of the extension pole breaking prematurely

customer_reviews.title: My New Apple Picker
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very well built should last me and my wife for the rest of our lives. Very easy to handle and doesn't damage the fruit like other pickers.
customer_reviews.author: tvaneps

customer_reviews.title: fully extended flimsy and bends metal poles easy.
customer_reviews.text: This is not sturdy enough to pick fruit such as mangoes at 25 to 30 ft. Pole bent to the point at which it was very difficult to retract short enough to put in the back of truck without it hanging out too far. I would estimate that if you only extened the 1st to 3rd section it may be strong enough to handle mango picking. Made it through a 9 mango picking session with all four sections extended. DOCA of you ever need a good fruit picking tool product tester I am your guy. This one failed. Might make a good duster.
customer_reviews.author: Shadrachwells

customer_reviews.title: Multiple use pole
customer_reviews.text: We are able to pick high fruit on our orange trees and cut high limbs with the saw. I wish there were also a tool to grab high things, like limbs, to lower within reach. Great tool but needs some more brainstorming for additional attachments. Suggestions: grabber, sprayer, clipper, etc. Also, Donald: I am a retired Chemical Sales Manager for a major chemical company and currently teaching Process Technology at a large community college, but if you need representation in the Houston area, I would be glad to discuss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality, excellent function.
customer_reviews.text: Compared with the fruit pickers available at hardware stores, this is much superior, and cheaper. It is sturdy aluminum, elongates to a very long length, is easy to use, has good hardware to clamp and unclamp the segments, and is lightweight. It contracts down to about 6 ft in length for easy storage. And, it arrived with an unanticipated bonus: an attachable duster for getting cobwebs high in the house. This is a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: MusicDoc

customer_reviews.title: Functional and practical tool
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought the apple picker out of season, I haven't used it yet, but I will use the dusting head now. Although it looks straight-forward in how to assemble, I would have found it helpful to have a little instructions in the box. I will go on to the website for any helps I need. I also would be interested in others tips on the best picking method and what other ways they use the extension pole. Looking forward to using it.thanks.
customer_reviews.author: kmcb

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good fruit harvesting pole
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to extend with two lever-clip locks independently operated to add length to the pole. Basket came with a damaged (bent) claw which has a cut in the metal. I bent it back to align it with the other claws but it could break off with use. Since the basket can be detached with ease, a second smaller basket- to allow better maneuvering among denser branches, and with somewhat longer claws- for harvesting smaller fruits like apricots, figs and small plums would be good. Do you carry such an option?
customer_reviews.author: steve E

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased hundreds of things Online And this is In Top 3. This is just an amazingly well-built and designed tool. It carefully picks the fruit it’s easy to extend tall and ratchet down short. Quality that will last 50 years! It just doesn’t get better. I have no connection to this business but anyone looking for a fruit picker look no more! I’ve tried everything and this is a Maserati fruit picker!
customer_reviews.author: Tweetybirdvicky

customer_reviews.title: Pole is amazing and can extend beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and maybe expected too much, but the pole can extend to an amazing length, and when fully extended gives you the ability to pick fruits off of a very tall tree. The avocados in my yard can be very big and heavy, so when picking them with a fully extended pole, is like catching a large fish and the struggle to bring it in can be challenging. The weight of the pole is heavier than I expected, but is needed to avoid snapping in half when fully extended. I chose the 24 foot pole and trying to get the pole back to it's shortened length takes some effort, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use, best orange picker ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! When the box came I couldn't believe how light it was. I borrowed a similar looking pole from my neighbor and it took two of us to carry it - it was so heavy. But this is wonderfully light and easy for me to reach up even with my 61 year old arms. It also has a wonderful duster to do all the ceiling fans. Didn't expect that bonus. I am EXTREMELY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT, thank you for making life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Wheeer

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: i would have given it 5 stars, but as it didn't come with assembly instructions, it took a while to work out how to put it together, once assembled it was very strong & sturdy, i needed it to pick lemons & grapefruit, the reach is very good but I have to pull really hard to pick them,. other wise I am very satisfied,
customer_reviews.author: Irene M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it yet but it looks very good. The height adjustments are much easier to use than our old pole which is 9 years old. This one is much shorter than the other pole because of the way the extensions go inside so doesn't take up as much room - a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Moira A Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well
customer_reviews.text: Already picked some apples from the upper portion of the tree and this extention pole can be adjusted easliy to any length. I would really go with a 4 and a half, but was not able and the reason was at this time the connection of the pole to the basket might be the weak link to this system. Time can only tell. That said, the pole could be used with many different implements and that is a plus, plus!
customer_reviews.author: John Wartnaby

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The reach is awesome, the saw cuts through palm frons and branches with ease.I just received it and used it for 5 hrs cuts great. You should be carefull when cutting with it fully extended the top section is a little flexible. Didn't use the fruit picker yet but like the guard that goes over the threads.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey winograd

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, seemingly good quality so far...
customer_reviews.text: Starting with four stars, only because it has been used for such a short time, but if the durability plays out, it's a five star item. The basket arrived first, then the pole a few days later. My son wasted no time assembling it and using it to pick pears from our pear trees. The quality seems to match the price and this unit is definitely better than a cheaper unit we had purchased years ago that did not last.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up very well. The basket does not attach well to the handle and is very wobbly. Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to carefully gather fruit from trees.
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one, researched, found yours and ordered. Pleased with the pole and basket. Think it will work beautifully. Cushioned basket protects fruit from bruising. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Best Aunt Around

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The basket is secured by a ring clamp that you tighten via a screw. It doesn’t stay tight but gets wobbly. And then I have to tighten again. The basket prongs even though coated still bruise my plums when I lift them off the branch. Not too happy with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: It does pick the fruit!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the ease of assembly and first use, quite successful. However, there should be an explanation of the many functions, which are not self evident. Although I requested it, no such item is available.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for any fruit
customer_reviews.text: I received the pole a few days ago and it is easy to use. My apples are not ripe yet but with the way this is made it will be very helpful getting the apples out of the top of my tree. I have some apples that are 20 feet of the ground that I will now be able to reach. I will be able to use it on my plum trees as well. I am very happy with the Docapole Fruit Picker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun reaching our far away avocados now. No more step ladders. Different attachments interest to reach out of the way places in the house. Like the right angle dusting tool. Even caught a lizard with it that was clinging on our drapes! Bet the makers didn't think of that one. Extremely well made and sturdy down to the release clamps for the extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: There was a problem with it getting delivered. Their customer service was great and they made sure that it arrived. And it’s strong, lightweight and a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: julianne moscovitz

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works well to get the best apples near top of our trees. Came with a bonus duster attachment. Haven’t used it yet but will be glad when I need to dust our cathedral ceiling. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rara

customer_reviews.title: Not for cherries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for picking cherries and the prongs on the basket are not close enough together. I’m sure this will work great for other fruit, but the search parameters that I typed in were “cherry picker“ so it is pretty much useless to me since I only have cherry trees.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Reach
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Pear picking in my yard. I love how far it reaches without bowing. It is sturdy and durable and I need that for my yearly harvest.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: The tool is really usefulto pock up fruits from tall trees with ease and with least damage to the fruits.. Thanks to Doca Pole for providing such a nice tool.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Bharadwaj

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pole to pick grapefruit from my tree. It was easy to assemble and worked great! I was able to pluck the ones that are high up without much of problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tukats

customer_reviews.title: This pole has REACH!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a tool to have on hand in case my mini camera drone gets caught in a tree... (after getting it caught in a tree.) It is well made, sturdy and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen U.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and useful. There are times when a ten foot pole just isn't enough, and this fills the bill at those times!
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This is an Excellent device for cleaning and fruit picking
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to help pick oranges out of my tree. That works fine. The added bonus I got was the additional attachments I got and bought for cleaning my second floor windows from the outside while I am on the ground floor. The scrubber and squeegee cleaned the windows while removing the water like a windshield wiper. This was a perfect investment. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Jim DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something that works
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to get to the top of my avocado trees Much better than the big box stores sell
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous picker that broke on its first use and retuned it. It had cheap plastic tabs for an extension. This picker showed up and was easy to use and extended fully. It very solid and should hold up for years to come. Great buy. It should be noted that it came with a dust attachment and the fruit picker showed up three days later. This should have been clarified at purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: The support is light and sturdy but the basket for fruits doesn't stay properly in the top. We used as tight as possible, but several times the connection for the basket looses up and stop working. I'm dissappointed for the price. We are trying to figure it out other way to connect the basket to stay stable
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing we did not like about this product. It is very sturdy and does it's job. We have two large apricot trees and my husband was able to collect them easily. The fruit that wasn't collected in the basket fell onto the tarp below.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Nice light Pole
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use easy to assemble. Used to pick citrus from top of trees and Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Rak

customer_reviews.title: Fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: It looks and easy to easy to assemble. No I encountered using this item
customer_reviews.author: Reymar

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use than the poles with the rope on it
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Cordes

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible sections.
customer_reviews.text: The pole works great. The collapsible sections are easy to operate. The only issue I had was that the cage would sometimes get stuck with the tree branches and pulling on the pole would cause the pole to lengthen, even with the sections in their stowed position. Overall, great product. Worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product, versatile, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: versatile. Besides using it as a fruit picker, we use it for dusting things high up (like ceiling fans) as it came with a duster attachment. Although I haven't tried it yet, I think I may be able to attach a paint roller and use it to paint high ceilings and walls without using a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schoth

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality tool.
customer_reviews.text: This extension pole and basket is a good tool for reaching high or awkward places. It is good for picking fruit (like avocados in a tall tree). It is also a good tool to have on hand for the unexpected need for a "longer arm." Thank you for being concerned about quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley W. Harbour

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality pole, glad I spent a little extra for the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Ulla Attia

customer_reviews.title: Long long
customer_reviews.text: This tha real thing. Easy to extend. Firm and long as hell
customer_reviews.author: Birdkall

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. I was amazed how far up in the tree it will reach. No more fruit falling on the ground because I can't get to it. No more falling off the ladder. It's worth the money. It's like an investment. I sell pears at the farmers market. THANKS. Also, I ordered it and got it the same week. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Addell Kay Pauling

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin aluminum pole
customer_reviews.text: Very thin aluminum pole that bent and broke on me while picking apples. Needless to say, I asked for a refund. Amazon was prompt in refunding my money after I explained what a defective product this fruit picking pole really is. Am still looking for a decent one that's not made from paper thin aluminum like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The dusting tool was an added bonus. For years I have been looking for something that effectively remove dust from my ceiling fan in the cathedral ceiling. This tool is lightweight and worked great. I have not used the fruit picker yet but I'm sure it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to go out and pick pears from the 40 foot tall trees. This was so easy to use. I put my leaf rake back in the barn. Next week it will be the apple trees and apricots. Love this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy to use extended.
customer_reviews.text: The pole is way too heavy to use extended. The first time it fell with the saw extension the saw cracked. When extended we were not able to keep it stable as it would not stay tightened. Will go back to our old lightweight very well worn but still useable one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McCorkle

customer_reviews.title: Love those Apples
customer_reviews.text: The pole and basket are easy to use and sturdy. Thank you for the quality job. It is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and sturdy. About to pick some ripe avocados and oranges! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nika Campro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for picking our apples! It telescopes out to get those high ones! It also works great with the duster too get those pesky cobwebs!
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Fruit basket needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The fruit basket doesn't really work when picking fruits that are high up. There is no blade to cut the stem and catch the goods. I tried multiple times to grab mangoes from my mango tree and was unsuccessfull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_customer129

customer_reviews.title: Have to pull really hard
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to get fruit off of tree without pulling really hard. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Reaches where you can't.
customer_reviews.text: The DecaPole fruit picker was as described, well-packaged and arrived before expected. It is relatively easy to use and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Using it
customer_reviews.text: Pole is long and expandable Assembly instructions would help as there are multiple parts to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Pot

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t tighten the cage enough to the pole. It came off way up in the tree. I had to borrow a tall ladder to get it down. It is definitely worth having. I got all my hard to reach fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well made tool. We live in Hawaii and it’s great for reaching the ripe fruit at very top of trees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got the my apples before the squirrels did!
customer_reviews.text: The DocaPole fruit picker works great. At 24 feet I was still able to grab apples off my tree. As reward, my wife made us a very nice apple pie (actually a few apple pies). Yum!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Les S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Turns Into a flimsy mess the first time you get fruit on the basket. Once bent it will not longer telescope back down to size and fit in return shipping box. If I have to take a sawzall to this thing for it to fit in a box I will but I will not be paying for this.
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet. Waiting to use it on our apple tree end of summer. Looks like it will do the job and the price was better than similar ones elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: M from WA

customer_reviews.title: no more ladders
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, but need to tighten clamps so extensions do not pull out inadvertently.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.  Lambert

customer_reviews.title: very well made.
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble just had to put the basket on. all you need is a flathead screwdriver.i use it to pick my apples a lot easier then climbing a ladder .highly recomend this pole to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for picking apples
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made durable product. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: Best fruit picker ever, I love it!!! Highly recommended if you have fruiter in your gardens, it is so convenient that I just pick up my avocado without bend my back.
customer_reviews.author: Zejin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used the pole for the first time to pick an American persimmon tree and it worked great. Fully extended it becomes more challenging to use, but it’s expected given the length.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit picking!
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job of picking fruit! Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory, effective, easy to use once I learned how
customer_reviews.text: Slow.. very slow.. to come . I have never picked citrus before so the learning curve is a bit challenging but it gets easier the more I use it. I do think there should be directions on how to put it together either in the packaging or online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal way to pick fruits!!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time I am able to pick the fruits at the very top of my trees. Got the window cleaning attachment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laks S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Avocados, which were too high, were easily picked with this telescoping fruit picker. No need for dangerous ladders. Unbelievably light & maneuverable. Arms & neck hurt the next day, but it was probably partly a fitness problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kalola Ohelo

customer_reviews.title: respuesta al vendedor
customer_reviews.text: everything went well unless I requested the one that came in the advertisement that brought the fruit collection basket and they sent me a feather duster that I don't need
customer_reviews.author: miriam

customer_reviews.title: product was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: multi purpose item with year around uses. the fruit picker, the dusting attachment and the ability to use the pole for painting and window washing made it a bonus buy. Tom
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use of this pole and the sturdiness will cause us to recommend to friends and neighbors to purchase this pole without any reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: The fruit picker pole
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's light enough for me to hold it when it's extended out. It pulls the fruit easily. Very nice looking and strong pole.
customer_reviews.author: Tien

customer_reviews.title: Makes picking fruit so easy!
customer_reviews.text: We are using it for our fruit trees! Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Braud-Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Pole broke picking one orange off tree. Only one segment of pole was telescoped out. This was the second time I had used it ever and the first time I picked two pieces of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Erik R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: DocaPole exceeded our expectations! Sturdy and durable, great quality. Definitely satisfied customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Carroll - GC Office Manager

customer_reviews.title: great little picker
customer_reviews.text: I used it almost immediately to pick my neighbor's pears that were at the top of the tree. Works beautifully. Prompt delivery and clear instructions for assembly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality product!!! Far surpassed my expectations. Well designed....works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tom K Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: Paid for a fruit picker and received a duster. We read a review saying that the fruit picking basket will come seperately in a few days.. its been 3 weeks.. NOTHING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Narayan Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: The fruit picker is very good! Would have liked simple instructions to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Elyse M. Reznick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that, because it is so sturdy and well built, it is a wee bit heavy and unwieldy when fully extended. Otherwise it is an excellent design.
customer_reviews.author: keith sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was TERRIBLE quality. Used it twice and broke in half the second time used. Don’t recommend! Overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Really extends the ability to get higher reach fruit!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. The grips are much easier to handle when going for higher fruit!
customer_reviews.author: James Herron

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: So wobbly that it’s length is almost outweighed by the difficulty snatching the fruit you want. Told owner/seller. He didn’t seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: harvest picker pole
customer_reviews.text: on quailty of harvest picker pole.....have not got to use the pole yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Using it for gathering fruit from high in a tree. No dislikes and everything works as it was advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Crawford W. Beveridge

customer_reviews.title: This helps pick apples.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well-designed. I use it to pick apples from old trees that have fruit that would be hard to reach without this tool.
customer_reviews.author: William G Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Pole is good quality
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for picking head but pole is very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, well designed, light weight, highly recommend it’s time to pick up avocados on my backyard! Ratataaa
customer_reviews.author: Albert Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the pole, it is very sturdy but the box did not have the twist on fruit picker, please send me the fruit picker. Thank you Kris
customer_reviews.author: krishna malempati

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. The extension is great. Keeps me from needing a ladder to reach fruit at the top of the tree. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It is very very week. Brook at the first time I pulled out exemption . Then I have to climb up the tree to use that. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Mubashar Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Piece part of extension broke the first few minutes of first use.
customer_reviews.author: RPena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase, this fruit picker works amazing. This product its highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FATIMA GRANADOS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great quality. The fruit picker pole is amazing! Will check other products from this company to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S. Terwilliger

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was skeptical at first, but it is really easy to use. Extends for far reaching fruit
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Salehpour

customer_reviews.title: My fruit picker
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can control the length,most fruit pickers are to short I use my picker for mangoes,avocados and coconuts
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pole to pull peaches and pears. This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Well made product of great quality.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and effective! Love the extension reach and tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Struna

customer_reviews.title: lenght
customer_reviews.text: the lock latches are not strong enough i drilled them and put small pins instead
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Pole
customer_reviews.text: It was made cheap and came broken and I would not recommend it to any one for any thing.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Colombo

customer_reviews.title: not good for picking fgs
customer_reviews.text: The add said it was good for picking figs... it is not!!
customer_reviews.author: jan jacobus

product_meta.title: DocaPole Fruit Picker with 6-24 Foot Extension Pole - Twist-On Fruit Picker Tool with Telescopic Pole // Fruit Picker Pole // Perfect Fruit Picking Pole for Apple Picking, Avocados, and Other Fruit
feature_bullets: EASY TWIST-ON FRUIT PICKER TOOL + 24 FOOT EXTENSION POLE – provides up to 18-20 feet of reach – simply twist the fruit picking basket onto the pole – most fruit picking baskets require the basket to be ratched onto the pole for every us – not the DocaPole Fruit Picker! Simply tighten the basket collar around the provided adapter prior to the first use.

MULTI-PICK BASKET – the large volume fruit picker basket can hold multiple pieces fruit, so that there’s no need to retract the basket after each pick. Let the basket fill up with fruit before retracting to save time.

BRUISE FREE – the DocaPole Fruit Picker comes with a padded insert to ensure all picked fruit fall onto and rest on a soft surface to prevent bruising and preserve the high quality of fresh picked fruit.

24 FOOT DOCAPOLE TELESCOPIC POLE – the 6-24 foot high-quality, light-weight aluminum extension pole is a high-quality, premium telescopic pole featuring a solid metal tip + a screw-on hinge tip with 180 degrees of rotation – use with a wide variety of attachments for window cleaning, light bulb changing, gutter cleaning, hanging lights, and more.

FRUIT PICKING TOOL FOR ALL FRUIT – this fruit picker tool supports all types of fruit picking: apple, avocado, orange, plum, nectarine, peach, mango, papaya, pear, lemon, lime, kiwi, grapefruit, pomegranate, fig, apricot, persimmons, and more!
